name.name: YMDTI: Diffusion Tensor Images of Healthy Young Males

software.description:
This dataset contains diffusion tensor images of 93 healthy, young male subjects.

Subject infomration:
age: 18-30, mean age 23
86 right-handed, 7 left-handed
no psychiatric or neurological diseases

DTI-images were recorded on a 3-T Philips Achieva scanner with the following specifications:
8-channel head coil
32 gradient directions
70 axial slices
slice thickness 2 mm
single-shot EPI sequence
TR = 7852 ms
TE = 60 ms
flip angle 90Â°
FOV = 224 mm
matrix = 112 x 112
